about_the_game:
Classic point-and-click adventure with a magical atmosphere and captivating music. You ring your friend's doorbell, but still, no one opens, although the light is on? Discover what happens one summer’s night Beyond the Wall of the garden with the tall house. Immerse yourself into a mysterious world where fantasy meets reality with a pinch of humor. Solve puzzles, collect items, and overcome obstacles that await you on your journey in thirteen unique levels Beyond the Wall.

Key features:
• No spoken words or text in the game.
• Beautiful hand-drawn visuals.
• Unique vibe of classic cut-out animation.
• Original music score.
• Suitable for children and adults.

Solve puzzles, collect items, and overcome obstacles that await you on your journey in thirteen unique levels Beyond the Wall.

Key features:

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 14.04+ (64 Bit only)
  • Processor: 2 GHz (Dual Core)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB VRAM
  • Storage: 360 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound Card with Latest Drivers
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu 17+ (64 Bit only)
  • Processor: 2.6 GHz (Dual Core)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB VRAM
  • Storage: 360 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound Card with Latest Drivers

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.7 (Lion) 64 bit
  • Processor: 2 GHz (Dual Core)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB VRAM, OpenGL compatible
  • Storage: 310 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound Card with Latest Drivers
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 13.2 (Ventura)
  • Processor: 2.6 GHz (Dual Core)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB VRAM, OpenGL compatible
  • Storage: 310 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound Card with Latest Drivers

name: Beyond the Wall

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 (64 bit)
  • Processor: 2 GHz (Dual Core)
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB VRAM, OpenGL compatible
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 310 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c Compatible with Latest Drivers
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 bit)
  • Processor: 2.6 GHz (Dual Core)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2 GB VRAM, OpenGL compatible
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 310 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 9.0c Compatible with Latest Drivers

short_description: Classic point-and-click adventure with a magical atmosphere. Discover what happens one night Beyond the Wall of the garden. Immerse yourself into a mysterious world where fantasy meets reality with a pinch of humor. Solve puzzles, collect items, and overcome obstacles that await you on your journey.
